  • Constructor Details

    • SpotifyUser

      public SpotifyUser​(Account account, boolean isNew)
      Instantiates a new SpotifyUser for a user - allows a Spotify account to be connected
      Parameters:
      account - the account for which the SpotifyUser will be instantiated
      isNew - determines whether the account is a refresh of a previous instantiation or if it is a new creation without a refresh token

  • Method Details

    • refreshPastAccess

      public boolean refreshPastAccess​(String refreshToken)
      Used to refresh previous Spotify API access using a refresh token.
      Parameters:
      refreshToken - the token to use to grab a new access token
      Returns:
      true if succeeded, otherwise false

    • getRefreshToken

      public String getRefreshToken()
      Get the refresh token of the SpotifyUser.
      Returns:
      Spotify user's refresh token

    • confirm

      public boolean confirm​(String accessToken)
      Used to confirm the authentication code for a Spotify user. This allows the actual client user to be instantiated by the server's Spotify login.
      Parameters:
      accessToken - the access token to be confirmed
      Returns:
      boolean of the result of the client authentication tokens being set for use

    • getUserURI

      public URI getUserURI()
      Gets the Spotify user's URI. Used for generating links used for authorisation.
      Returns:
      the user's Spotify account URI

    • pausePlayback

      public boolean pausePlayback()
      Used to pause the playback of the user's Spotify account. Throws an error to ErrorHandler if it is unable to do so.
      Returns:
      true if successful, otherwise false

    • getCurrentlyPlaying

      public se.michaelthelin.spotify.model_objects.specification.Track getCurrentlyPlaying()
      Gets the user's currently playing Spotify song. Rate limited to once every 1.5 seconds to prevent spamming Spotify. If a second requests is made within two seconds of the first, the same results will be returned.
      Returns:
      a Track variable of the user's currently playing song.

    • getSongProgress

      public long getSongProgress()
      Gets the progress in MS for the song that is currently playing. Must be called immediately after getCurrentlyPlaying() or it will not contain the most recently updated timestamp. Uses the time that currentlyPlaying was called to Spotify plus the current time and the provided progress time.
      Returns:
      the progress in MS for the currently playing song

    • getCurrentTrackLength

      public long getCurrentTrackLength()
      Returns the length of the most recently requested playing track in milliseconds.
      Returns:
      current track length in ms

    • getCurrentAlbumCover

      public String getCurrentAlbumCover()
      Gets the album cover as a URL (returned as a String) for the user's currently playing song. getCurrentlyPlaying() MUST be called first. This is purely for rate limiting reasons - ends up being way too many requests otherwise and results in program being inoperable.
      Returns:
      the URL (in form of a String) for the user's currently playing song's album cover. Used for display on client.

    • nextTrack

      public boolean nextTrack()
      Skips the user's song to the next one.
      Returns:
      true if successful, otherwise false

    • previousTrack

      public boolean previousTrack()
      Rewinds to the user's previously played track.
      Returns:
      true if successful, otherwise false

    • resumePlayback

      public boolean resumePlayback()
      Resumes the Spotify user's playback if it was paused. Throws error to ErrorHandler if unable to resume.
      Returns:
      true if successful, otherwise false

    • isPaused

      public boolean isPaused()
      Determines whether this Spotify user is currently playing music or not.
      Returns:
      true if is paused, otherwise false

    • createPlaylist

      public se.michaelthelin.spotify.model_objects.specification.Playlist createPlaylist​(String playlistName)
      Creates a playlist on the user's behalf.
      Parameters:
      playlistName - the name for the playlist
      Returns:
      the playlist that is created, null if did not succeed.

    • addToPlaylist

      public void addToPlaylist​(String playlistID, String[] uris)
      Adds one or many songs to a given playlist via its Spotify ID. Songs are received in a string list to allow simple iteration.
      Parameters:
      playlistID - the Spotify ID of the playlist to be added to
      uris - String array of Spotify song URIs to be added to the given playlist

    • getPlaylists

      public se.michaelthelin.spotify.model_objects.specification.PlaylistSimplified[] getPlaylists()
      Gets the playlists that the user has on their account.
      Returns:
      Array of PlaylistSimplified to allow search, iteration etc.
